nodes.text: Ebe E. Endocott was a Triffian podracer from Triffis who participated in the Boonta Eve Classic race on the planet Tatooine during the Naboo Crisis. Endocott successfully completed the race in fourth place, being beaten by the human Anakin Skywalker, the Xexto Gasgano and the Glymphid Aldar Beedo.
